actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to reduce the corporate income tax rate by 8 percentage points by repealing DISC and the investment credit for corporations.

summary.text: Repeals the corporate investment credit under the Internal Revenue Code. Reduces the corporate normal tax rate to 16 percent. Terminates the tax exemption treatment accorded to Domestic International Sales Corporations (DISC). Reduces the corporate surtax rate to 24 percent.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the corporate income tax rate by 8 percentage points by repealing DISC and the investment credit for corporations.
